dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.configureStakesInRiskTab: Configure your stakes in the Risk Management tab
dashboard.stakedVsReturned: Staked vs Returned and performance by bookmaker

bets.title: Bets
bets.manageAndView: Manage and view all your bets ({count} found)
bets.filterByMultipleCriteria: Filter your bets by multiple criteria
bets.noBetsFound: No bets found with these criteria
bets.detailedAnalysis: Detailed analysis and complete information about this bet
bets.noSpecialCharacteristics: No special characteristics applied to this bet
bets.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the bet details, selections, etc.
bets.stakeLogicPlaceholder: E.g., 2% of bankroll, Flat $50, Kelly Criterion
bets.deletionWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this bet? This action cannot be undone.

addBet.title: Add Bet
addBet.description: Register a new bet with advanced features
addBet.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Multiple bet with 3 games from the Brazilian league. Analysis based on recent statistics...

sections.detailsMultiple: Configure each of the {count} legs of the multiple

fields.tagsDescription: Select up to 5 tags to categorize this bet

placeholders.descriptionExample: e.g., Multiple bet with 3 games from the Brazilian league. Analysis based on recent statistics...
placeholders.stakeLogicExample: Justification for bet amount, risk analysis, % of bankroll used...

buttons.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all form fields?

validation.fillValues: Fill in values to see suggestions
validation.highRiskDesc: You are betting above {label}. This represents a higher than normal risk to your bankroll.
validation.veryHighRiskDesc: You are betting significantly above recommended ({recommendation}). This could seriously compromise your bankroll.
validation.lowOddsDesc: Odds below {min} may not be worth the risk, even with high stake.
validation.extremelyLowOddsDesc: Odds below {min} rarely offer value, even on safe lines.
validation.veryHighOddsDesc: Odds above {max} have low probability. Consider reducing stake.
validation.extremelyHighOddsDesc: Odds above {max} are extremely high risk. Recommended to use minimum stake.

leg.title: Leg
leg.protectionTypesDesc: Select one or more applicable protections

modal.title: Confirm Bet Addition
modal.subtitle: Review all details before adding the bet to the system

watchlist.title: Watchlist & Exposure
watchlist.noLiveGames: No live games at the moment
watchlist.pendingGamesDesc: Bets on games yet to start
watchlist.rankingBasedOnHistory: Classification based on win rate and average ROI from your history
watchlist.noTeamsFound: No teams found with the applied filters
watchlist.cannotDeleteDemo: Cannot delete demo data. Add real teams to manage them.
watchlist.confirmRemoveTeam: Are you sure you want to remove this team from monitoring?

teamConcentration.title: Team Concentration Risk
teamConcentration.description: Teams with highest stake exposure - monitor to avoid over-exposure
teamConcentration.noTeams: No teams with active bets at the moment

plScenarios.title: Result Scenarios
plScenarios.description: Potential impact of active bets on your bankroll
plScenarios.tipPositive: Your current bets have positive expectation.
plScenarios.tipNegative: Review your bets to improve profit expectation.
plScenarios.tipMessage: Expected value considers your historical win rate.

marketDistribution.title: Market Distribution
marketDistribution.description: How your stake is distributed across markets
marketDistribution.noBets: No active bets at the moment
marketDistribution.concentrated: {percent}% of your stake is concentrated in {market}. Consider diversifying.
marketDistribution.balanced: Your distribution is balanced across {count} different markets.

import.title: Import Bets
import.subtitle: Import your bets in bulk using CSV or Excel files

uploadCard.title: File Upload
uploadCard.description: Select a CSV or Excel (.xlsx) file to import
uploadCard.selectOrDrag: Select a file or drag here

errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Only CSV and Excel (.xlsx) are allowed.
errors.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
errors.emptyFile: Empty file or no valid data
errors.parseError: Error processing file. Check the format.

steps.title: Next steps:
steps.step1: Select your CSV or Excel file
steps.step3: Fix errors if necessary in the preview screen

template.title: Template Download
template.description: Download a ready-to-fill template with your bets
template.introText: The template comes with examples of single and multiple bets to make it easier to fill out. Fill in the data and upload the file to import your bets in bulk.
template.csvDescription: Universal format, editable in any program
template.tip2: For multiple bets, use one row per leg with the same operationNumber
template.tip4: Separate tags with | (pipe), e.g., "Value Bet|Safe Line"

columnMapping.title: Column Mapping
columnMapping.description: Understand what each column means in the import file
columnMapping.simpleBetTip: Single Bets: Use only 1 row with legNumber=1
columnMapping.multipleBetTip: Multiple Bets: Use one row per leg, all with the same operationNumber or description
columnMapping.conditionalFieldsTip: Conditional fields (like originalOdds) are only required if the related field (hasBoost) is true

columns.tags: Tags separated by | (e.g., Value Bet|Safe Line)

empty.noResults: No imports found with this term

betsSection.title: Bets from this Import ({count})
betsSection.noBets: No bets found for this import

bankrollSettings.title: Financial Management
bankrollSettings.subtitle: Configure your bankroll, deposits, goals and risk protection

deposits.title: Manual Deposits History
deposits.subtitle: Record and track your deposits to the bankroll

withdrawals.title: Manual Withdrawals History
withdrawals.subtitle: Record and track your withdrawals from the bankroll
withdrawals.errorExceedsBankroll: Withdrawal amount cannot exceed available bankroll.

goals.title: Main Goal
goals.subtitle: Configure your monthly goal and track progress

risk.stopLossGainSubtitle: Set protection limits by period. Toggle between R$ and % as you prefer.
risk.tooltipDailyLoss: Maximum loss allowed in a single day. When reached, stop betting.
risk.tooltipDailyGain: Daily profit target. When reached, consider stopping to protect gains.
risk.tooltipWeeklyLoss: Maximum loss allowed in the week. Protects against bad streaks.
risk.tooltipWeeklyGain: Weekly profit target. Consider cashing out part of the gains when reached.
risk.tooltipMonthlyLoss: Maximum loss allowed in the month. Review your strategy if reached.
risk.tooltipMonthlyGain: Monthly profit target. When reached, consider taking partial profits.

dialogs.deleteDepositDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this deposit? This action will recalculate your current bankroll.
dialogs.deleteWithdrawalDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this withdrawal? This action will recalculate your current bankroll.
dialogs.editBankrollDescription: Are you sure you want to change the initial bankroll?
dialogs.editBankrollWarning: Warning: This change may impact your ROI calculations, percentages and goals.

common.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

risk.sustainableGrowthTip: To maintain sustainable growth, keep ROI above 3% and average stake below 3% of bankroll.

goalTracking.title: Goal Tracking
goalTracking.onTrackMessage: Maintaining the current pace, you should reach your goal!
goalTracking.needsImprovementMessage: You need to increase your daily average by {amount} to reach the goal.
goalTracking.startBettingMessage: Start betting to progress toward your goal!
goalTracking.expiredMessage: The deadline for this goal has expired. You were {amount} short of reaching it.

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: Detailed performance analysis by team, league, and strategy

teamStats.title: Performance by Team
teamStats.subtitle: Analyze your betting results for each team

leagueStats.title: Performance by League
leagueStats.subtitle: Analyze your betting results for each league

strategyStats.title: Performance by Strategy
strategyStats.subtitle: Analyze your betting results for each strategy

errorAlert.title: {count} row(s) with error(s)
errorAlert.description: Fix all errors before importing. Use filters or click "Edit" on rows highlighted in red.

confirmDialog.title: Confirm Import
confirmDialog.description: You are about to import {count} bet(s).
confirmDialog.finalWarning: This action will create the bets and update your bankroll. Do you want to continue?

cancelDialog.title: Cancel Import?
cancelDialog.description: All preview data will be lost and you will return to the import page. Do you really want to cancel?

index.title: Welcome to Your App
